reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 110/01: RELEASE OF RESERVATIONS IN LETTERS PATENT
reg_info.reg_name_text: release of reservations in letters patent
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 110/01: RELEASE OF RESERVATIONS IN LETTERS PATENT
reg_info.act_under: Public Lands Act   Loi sur les terres publiques

content.content: 1. The Minister is hereby authorized to release the following classes of reservations in accordance with subsection 68.1 (2) of the Act: 1. Reservations of trees of any species. 2. Reservations of sand and gravel. 3. Reservations conferring the right to use, for fishery purposes, the banks of a body of water, not exceeding 20.12 metres in depth from the water’s edge. 4. Reservations conferring a right of access and free passage along the shores of rivers, streams and lakes. 5. Reservations of the surface rights in any public or colonization road crossing the land granted. 6. Reservations of a percentage of surface rights for road purposes. 7. Reservations of a right of way for a railway line where the line is not constructed.  O. Reg. 110/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Minister is hereby authorized to release the following classes of reservations in accordance with subsection 68.1 (2) of the Act:

1. Reservations of trees of any species.

2. Reservations of sand and gravel.

3. Reservations conferring the right to use, for fishery purposes, the banks of a body of water, not exceeding 20.12 metres in depth from the water’s edge.

4. Reservations conferring a right of access and free passage along the shores of rivers, streams and lakes.

5. Reservations of the surface rights in any public or colonization road crossing the land granted.

6. Reservations of a percentage of surface rights for road purposes.

7. Reservations of a right of way for a railway line where the line is not constructed.  O. Reg. 110/01, s. 1.
